modName: Too Long Since We Had a Good Bandit Raid
summary:
This mod makes it so right after a guard complains about it being too long since they 
had a good bandit raid, a raid occurs.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  Readme - Too Long Since We Had a Good Bandit Raid 1_0
Game:  TES V: Skyrim
Author:  David Brasher                                     
Date:  5/2/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   This mod makes it so right after a guard complains about it being too long since they 
had a good bandit raid, a raid occurs.

	   The guard says, \"I mostly deal with petty thievery and drunken brawls. Been too long 
since we\'ve had a good bandit raid.\"  He better be careful what he wishes for!

	   The eight bandits that make up each bandit raid are fairly low-level and hopefully 
won\'t succeed in massacring too many townspeople and completely depopulating your towns. 

	   The bandits get reused by being resurrected and moved to where they need to be, so this 
mod cannot create any PlaceAtMe savegame bloat.

	   If you get tired of waiting for a guard to wish for a bandit raid, you can trigger one
on your own by using this console code:

SetStage AABanditRaid 10

	   So if you are looking for a laugh or a bit of unexpected excitement at odd intervals,
then this could be a good mod for you. 
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************
           Extract (decompress) the .esp and the .bsa to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to \"Too Long Since We Had a Good Bandit Raid.esp\" in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract files someplace else.  Then move the .esp and .bsa 
to Skyrim\\Data.  Mark the box next to the plugin in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 1.0    5/2/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   This is a joke mod.  I do not imagine that everyone will want to keep it active in their 
load orders forever.  Many people will probably just want to play it for a few days and then remove 
it when the novelty wears off.	   
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:  Bethesda for making Skyrim in an open format anyone can mod.
		
Copy Status:  Public domain.  Do whatever you like with this.      
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
